name: A minute
description:
This is my 2D Survival Shooter project. 

Modifications: 

1) Changed the game theme from shooter to survival shooter. In order to win, you need to survive for a minute.

2)Changed all backdrops(like menu, level win screen etc.)

3)Added music, which I created using LMMS. 1 song for a menu, 1 song for actual gameplay. 

4)Added two levels, the first one is more of a tutorial, the second one is a challenge.
